loginPage.title: Sign in to your account
loginPage.subtitle: Don't have an account?
loginPage.needLogin: You need to login for access the page!

dashboardPage.title: Memorage
dashboardPage.description: Your personal word storage and learning companion. Create collections, store words, and practice efficiently.

feature1.title: Create Collections
feature1.description: Organize your words into themed collections for efficient learning and review.

feature2.title: Add Words
feature2.description: Easily add new words to your collections. Import words from images and add to collections!

feature3.title: Practice Exercises
feature3.description: Test your knowledge with various exercise types designed to reinforce your learning.

dashboardPage.callToActionDescription: Start creating your word collections and begin your learning journey with Memorage today.

profilePage.title: Profile Settings
profilePage.userUpdated: Your information has been successfully updated!
profilePage.userError: There was an error updating your information. Please try again later.
profilePage.passwordChanged: Your password has been changed successfully.
profilePage.passwordError: There was an error changing your password. Please ensure your current password is correct and try again.

collectionsPage.yourCollectionsDescription: Choose from your custom language learning collections
collectionsPage.dialogSubtitle: Create a new word collection. Click save when you're done.
collectionsPage.alertDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your word collection and remove your words with in it.
collectionsPage.presetDescription: Choose from our curated language learning collections
collectionsPage.noCollectionTitle: You have not created a collection yet
collectionsPage.noCollectionDescription: Get started by creating your first word collection.

collectionPage.noWordTitle: You have not added a word yet
collectionPage.noWordDescription: Get started by creating your first word.

exercisesPage.title: Exercises
exercisesPage.dialogSubtitle: Choose a word collection to start the {{exerciseName}} exercise.
exercisesPage.notEnoughWords: You need to add at least 4 words to start this exercise.

shuffleExercise.name: Shuffle
shuffleExercise.description: Shuffle cards and find the translation word.
shuffleExercise.title: Shuffle Exercise

fillInTheBlanksExercise.name: Fill in the Blanks
fillInTheBlanksExercise.description: Read the sentences and fill in the missing words.
